body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is George Hernandez and the customer's name is Kelly Perry.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I am an agent from Bright Solutions. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah! I need some help with my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! To get started, could I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is John Smith.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John! I appreciate that. Can you also provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Lastly, could you please tell me your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's one two three, four five six, seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, John. I have everything I need to help you. What seems to be the issue with your account?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am unable to log in to my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can assist you with that. Thank you for your time, John, and I will work on resolving your issue right away.
